title: storage path
extract: Folder. ... Folders are also called directories because of the way they organize data within the file system of a storage device. All folders are subfolders, or subdirectories of the root directory. For example, in Windows, C:\ is the root directory of the startup disk.Jun 12, 2015
extract_html: Folder. ... Folders are also called directories because of the way they organize data within the file system of a storage device. All folders are subfolders, or subdirectories of the root directory. For example, in Windows, C:\ is the root directory of the startup disk.Jun 12, 2015
